original_text: Lest thou make a covenant with the inhabitants of the land, and they go a whoring after their gods, and do sacrifice unto their gods, and one call thee, and thou eat of his sacrifice;
korean_text: 너는 삼가 그 땅의 주민과 언약을 세우지 말지니 이는 그들이 모든 신을 음란하게 섬기며 그들의 신들에게 제물을 드리고 너를 청하면 네가 그 제물을 먹을까 함이며

sentences.original_text: with the inhabitants of the land,
and they go a whoring after their gods,
and do sacrifice unto their gods,
and thou eat of his sacrifice;
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 그의 제물을 먹게 될 것임
